page.title: 11LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: We interviewed a husband and wife who have been living in Arborfield for aroud 57 years. The wife came when she was 20.She is now 71. They brought 3 children up in the village.The children now have jobs and don't live in the village. The wife worked in a place called Newlands, that building isn't standing anymore.She has a chicken called Junior which lays some eggs but they sell eggs from another man.They grow peas,onions,potatoes and a few other vegetables and they sell some of them. Their bungalow is 58 years old, the husband built it himself. His Great Grandma and Grandpa owned Newlands Farm at one time.They say they like the village how it used to be.
